subject: Re: Ghost Box discussion and demo on my show
author: mllejade
full_text:
What was I doing at the office last night after 7:00pm Pacific time 
when everyone else have gone home for the long holiday weekend?  I was 
listening to Mike's show online on my office computer (I only have dial-
up at my home computer).  Great show, Mike, especially for those of us 
new to ghost boxes.

Happy New Year,
Sharon

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Got an hour to listen to my latest internet radio show while you work 
> or play on your computer? I talk about the new methods used to make 
> communication attempts with entities & spirits and the other devices 
I 
> have been building (Micro Box and Shadow Detection).
> Then I demonstrate each of the 5 different Radio Shack Hack Ghost Box 
> System configurations I have put together in recent weeks. Hear some 
> for the first time on my show Ghost to Ghost PM.
> Hear it here:  http://www.ghosttoghostpm.com
> 
> - Mike
>
